::DevilDuer/Perndabot::

DevilDuer steps back from the CR chamber that he and Perndabot had installed 
in the alliance base.

"Ah, Zardus should be pleased," Perndabot says. DevilDuer growls. He hated 
work, and installing the CR chamber took quite alot of it.

"Yeah yeah, whatever," he grumbles, turning around to walk off.

"Wait," Perndabot says as he sees DevilDuer start to walk off, "Take these 
metals to the cargo hold," he says, pointing to a pile of metal that they had 
salvaged from the crashed ship.

DevilDuer sighs. "Ok. This is the last thing though," he says, picks up the 
metal, and walks off.
